dialogues.text: Sorry, Bangz?

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: GLITTER
dialogues.text: Fuck you.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Fuck you too! Asshole.

dialogues.speaker: GLITTER
dialogues.text: Aria?

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: I'm here.

dialogues.speaker: GLITTER
dialogues.text: You got the ax. Don't let the band die.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Sure. GLITTER closes his eyes and goes still. Silently, Dr. D, BANGZ and SPYDER exit, leaving ARIA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BOYS walk up to RASPUTIN.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Where did that preacher go?

dialogues.speaker: RASPUTIN
dialogues.text: I don't know. I didn't see them leave. They may be here somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Let's find them. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: RASPUTIN
dialogues.text: Fine.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: You stay here. Watch Aria.

dialogues.speaker: RASPUTIN
dialogues.text: Tear ‘em apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARIA lays a scarf over GLITTER'S HEAD. There's a COUGH un the scarf and ARIA pulls it away.

dialogues.speaker: GLITTER
dialogues.text: Where is everybody?

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: We thought you were dead.

dialogues.speaker: GLITTER
dialogues.text: I ain't dead. I'm just a head.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: GLITTER
dialogues.text: (coughing) I think I got a slug stuck in my throat. Could you dig it out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCRUGGS and four HIS FLOCK and are busy with cases of dynamite.

dialogues.speaker: REVEREND
dialogues.text: If Satan won't go to Hell, Hell shall come to Satan. Call forth the helicopter and we shall be carried up even as the demon spawn are cast down. The ZEALOT speaks into the walkie-talkie. SCRUGGS sets th timer on the bomb for five minutes.

dialogues.speaker: ZEALOT
dialogues.text: Gabriel, this is the Lamb of God. We got a pick-up. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: REVEREND
dialogues.text: We shall not bargain with publicans and sinners.

dialogues.speaker: ZEALOT
dialogues.text: But, sir. That lady did resurrect us from the dead.

dialogues.speaker: REVEREND
dialogues.text: The Bible says thou shalt not permit a witch to live.

dialogues.speaker: ZEALOT
dialogues.text: It also says "Do unto others".

dialogues.speaker: REVEREND
dialogues.text: Shut up! Thou art infected with the spore of evil.

dialogues.speaker: ZEALOT
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. I'll take a shower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEOPLE are leaving the theatre. PUSSY talks to her TV audience.

dialogues.speaker: PUSSY
dialogues.text: The Diamond Dead have made rock history tonight, demonstrating their seemingly superhuman powers over life and death. Not since Paul McCartney's miraculous resurrection have any real acts of rock and roll Shamanism been used in performance. One thousand bullet-ridden happy Diamond Dead fanatics will tell you that it was all real. What's next for this band? Is this the start of a new religion? Nobody knows, but it doesn't matter because I was here and you weren't. JACK and GEENA walk out of the theatre.

dialogues.speaker: PUSSY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Excuse me. What do you think of the Diamond Dead?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Yeah. They were cool. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSSY star 119.

dialogues.speaker: GEENA
dialogues.text: A little weak on bass and the energy seemed a little down.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: The sound engineers seemed to favor the high end.

dialogues.speaker: GEENA
dialogues.text: I noticed that, too.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: It's a common mistake.

dialogues.speaker: PUSSY
dialogues.text: But what about the climax?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: The whole death trip has been a little overplayed.

dialogues.speaker: GEENA
dialogues.text: What are the Diamond Dead going to follow it up with?

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: It's the whole Andy Warhol trap.

dialogues.speaker: GEENA
dialogues.text: They've got no place to go.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Sorry, Pussy, but the Diamond Dead have reached their height.

dialogues.speaker: GEENA
dialogues.text: Has-been city.

dialogues.speaker: JACK
dialogues.text: Great while it lasted.

dialogues.speaker: GEENA
dialogues.text: Pack it up Pussy. es open-mouthed as JACK and GEENA walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MATHIAS sits behind the desk, staring at the far wall. AR is pounding on his door. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Hey! Open up! Mathias! MATHIAS opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: Go away.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: I can't. I'm really not well.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Fine.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: I'll call you, okay? ARIA takes her scythe and begins to smash down Mathias' d MATHIAS dives under his desk.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go away! ARIA comes through the ruined door

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: C'mon. I need your help. The boys have gone after Scruggs. They're gonna kill him.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: It's no good, Aria. I'm no hero. I ran from the fight. I always run. It's my nature. I hate me. I can't help you. I can't help myself. This will never work between us.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Oh grow some balls you whiny little sissy boy. I know its probably not going to work between us

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: You do?

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Sure. Besides, I think I can work it out now between D and I. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: I'm happy for you.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Doesn't mean you can sit here pissing your panties. I'm not done fucking with your world yet. Where's your car keys?

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: I need your car. I think Scruggs is on his way to the airport.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: You can't drive my car. It's a Stingray classic. I don't even drive it.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Perfect! ARIA grabs MATHIAS by the arm and yanks him to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: No more! No more! ARIA puts down her SCYTHE and grabs MATHIAS, throws him o her shoulder, and walks out.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: I don't have time to argue. The boys are hungry and we got to stop them before it's too late.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. D, BANGZ and SPYDER climb the outside of the building

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: I'm fuckin' James Bond. Fuckin'

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: (letting go to talk) ) Extreme violence. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: Extreme senseless violence.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: Maximum wholesale violence.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Don't talk. Climb.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: I love this man.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: He has a way with words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEREND SCRUGGS turns to his ZEALOT.

dialogues.speaker: REVEREND
dialogues.text: What's the chopper's ETA?

dialogues.speaker: ZEALOT
dialogues.text: Ten minutes. BANGZ CLIMBS onto the roof.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: No fuckin' time left, Scruggs. Cuz I'm James fuckin' Bond, 007.

dialogues.speaker: ZEALOT
dialogues.text: What? Dr. D joins BANGZ, then SPYDER.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Can you pray, Rev?

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: Better make it a short prayer

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Yeah. Real fuckin' short. BANGZ leaps forward attacking the TWO FANATICS closest to edge. Bangz's momentum carries all three over the edge an they disappear from sight. Dr. D snarls and leaps at SCRU his long claws slashing the Reverend's face. The ZEALOT r but SPYDER drags him down and snaps his spine. SCRUGGS sw at Dr. D but Dr. D catches the fist and crushes the Reverend's fingers. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Say "Hi" to Jesus for me. Dr. D slashes SCRUGGS' throat and then CRUSHES HIS SKULL bare hands.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Asshole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The place is now deserted. Dr. D, BANGZ and SPYDER walk through the lobby, knee deep in garbage.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: I guess it's over.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Yeah. Those fuckin' guys were great.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: No. I mean the band.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: I had fun.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Me, too.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Why, we got a hell of a fuckin' show. We kill the audience every night. Wow! I think it's fuckin' great.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Everybody's afraid of death. It's an unknown. People feel powerless against it. Some folks will see us as having the power to help them beat death. Others will see us and think if they can beat us, they can beat death. Either way, every show we play is going to be a slaughter.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Fuck them.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: (Good puppet ) D's right. It's over. (MORE) (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They go th

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Besides, we did what we came to do. We fucked with everybody. One last time.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Buggered by pansy ass fearheads. This fuckin' sucks.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: (Good puppet) We better go underground.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: We can't hide.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Oh God. Not the fuckin' white light again.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Yup.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Shit! What about Aria?

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: You love her right?

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Ahhh! She doesn't need me. She needs that little poser sissy. I finally figured it out. I love me. I'm what I need to be happy. I'm too damn me. And nobody should have to deal too much with my meanness.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: That is either the most noble thing you have ever said or the most disgusting. rough the lobby doors into the house.

dialogues.speaker: QUIGNOL
dialogues.text: DR. D, BANGZ and SPYDER enter. Standing on stage is VERON VINYL, holding Aria's scythe.

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: Hello, boys.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Hey, it's the fuckin' rubber lady. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: Told you I didn't eat her.

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: Hello, Spyder honey.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: Where ya been? SPYDER climbs onto the stage.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: D. Bangz, this is Veronica, soon to be Mrs. Syn.

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: Sorry, Spyder honey, but the engagement's off.

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: I could never marry you. You're a freak. Veronica swings the scythe and buries it in Spyder's ches

dialogues.speaker: SPYDER SYN
dialogues.text: What a woman. VERONICA draws back the weapon and levels it at Dr. D and BANGZ. SPYDER stumbles back a few steps.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: You're a real femme fatale, ain't ya?

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: It's nothing personal, D. It's a Presidential secret order. I have to do you guys. It's my job. Not that I don't enjoy my work. I do, but you guys are different SPYDER removes the sock puppets from his hands. BANGZ and D slowly approach VERONICA.

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't come any closer. I know how to use this scythe. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: Go ahead. I'm not afraid of death.

dialogues.speaker: BANGZ
dialogues.text: Yeah. Big fuckin' deal.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D
dialogues.text: We're already dead. SPYDER walks up behind VERONICA unseen. He removes his ma Where spyder's head should be, there is a huge balled fis Slowly, long taloned digits unfurl. SPYDER'S head is a gi clawed hand. Dr. D and BANGZ look surprised. VERONICA reads their expressions and turns around. She screams. VERONICA flips forward switch and the scythe activates. SPYDER'S fist envelopes Veronica's head and squeezes. Blo erupts between the fingers. VERONICA drops the still activated scythe. Dr. D picks it up without turning it off. SPYDER drops VERONICA'S gory remains and puts his natural arm on Dr. D shoulder. BANGZ joins them as the LIGHTNING ARCS off the blade.

dialogues.speaker: DR. D, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Better to burn out than to fade away... Together, the BAND rots, dries up, and blows away in seco The scythe falls to the ground, clattering noisily on the empty stage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARIA and MATHIAS stand on the shoulder of the road, havin just stepped out of Mathias' Stingray.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Sure you don't want to come with?

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: No. I'm committing myself ina couple hours.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Suit yourself. What about your theatre? (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: MATHIAS smiles sheepishly. In the distance we HEAR the so of a massive explosion. He looks at Aria, as if to say "S I'm fucked".

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: I'm insured but thanks anyway.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: I'm gonna miss you.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: I'll miss you too, in a strange masochistic, romantic, terrified way. I'm sorry about your band. I'm sorry about your... you know... um boyfriend.

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: I'm gonna miss a lot of things. Oh well, that's life.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: According to death?

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: That's me. MATHIAS gets in the car.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: You're truly special. You know that, don't you?

dialogues.speaker: ARIA
dialogues.text: Of course. I'm not stupid. MATHIAS starts his car and drives off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MATHIAS is talking to himself.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: This sucks. A hearse going the other direction screams past MATHIAS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ARIA begins to walk down the road, her scythe over her shoulder and a head-shaped bundle wrapped in butchers pap in her hand. (CONTINUED)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: A car speeds past her and then slams on it's brakes. It i '57 Cadillac hearse. ARIA smiles and gets in. The hearse roars it's engine and takes off for the vanishing point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MATHIAS slams on his brakes and power slides 180 degrees. roars after the hearse.

dialogues.speaker: MATHIAS
dialogues.text: Rock and Roll ! This is crazy! This is crazy! Reprise: "CRASH TEST DUMMIES IN LOVE".
